search.query: index=* source="/tmp/splunkdata/FlattenedMessages*" Sender="$me$" | eval Message = lower(Message) | rex field=Message max_match=0 "(?<word>[^\s]+)" | fields word | mvexpand word | rex field=word mode=sed "s/[\.\?]+$//" | eval wordtype = case( like(word, "%fuck%"), "swear", like(word, "%shit%"), "swear", 1 == 1, "normal" ) | timechart span=1month count(eval(wordtype="swear")) as swear, count(eval(wordtype="normal")) as normal, distinct_count(word) as distinct_words | eval swear_percent = (swear / (normal + swear)) * 100 | eval warning = if(swear_percent > 0.5, 2000, null) | fields - normal swear
